name: PHP Developer (Symfony)
description:
We are an international IT company. Since 2002, we have been working on major software development projects for world famous Western European companies (automotive concerns, telecommunication companies, banks, medical corporations, etc.).

Now we are looking for a Middle+/Senior PHP (Symfony) developer to join our team (remotely) to work on our projects.

We expect from candidates:

- 2-3+ years of commercial development experience;

- Good knowledge of PHP and Symfony framework;

- Knowledge of relational databases (PostgreSQL), RabbitMQ, Redis, Elasticsearch and NoSQL (MongoDB);

- Experienced in microservices architecture;

- General knowledge of computer science, OOP, data structures and algorythms;

- Ability to work with JIRA, Confluence or similar systems;

- Skills in DevOps would be a plus (Docker, AWS, ECS, CI/CD, Terraform, Ansible, Gitlab);

- English of Intermediate level or higher (reading/writing technical documentation, communicating with development team).

The benefits you get working with us:

- Opportunity to work remotely in any time zone or in comfortable offices or both (at your choice);

- Competitive official salary and regular updates based on performance review results;

- Official employment, paid holidays and sick leave;

- Stable long-term employment (8 hours a day, 40 hours a week); flexible working hours;

- Careful onboarding with an experienced mentor, opportunity to learn new technologies and their application in projects, in-house trainings, meetups, tech talks and technical skills upgrading (during working hours);

- Strong development team, clearly defined processes and methodology of development;

- Wide variety of projects from innovative high-tech start-ups to high-powered, high-volume giants from big European clients, and the opportunity to personally influence technical decisions at the project level;

- Free English and French courses during working hours;

- relocation package, referral program, exciting corporate parties/teambuildings and other nice benefits in the office: tea/coffee/biscuits/fruits, equipped kitchen, fitness room with shower and massage chair, kicker, PS, etc.;

- absence of total control from the company: we do not take screenshots of the monitor while working, we do not monitor mouse movements on the desktop, we do not switch off the office timer every time the kettle boiled and you went to get a mug of hot tea. What matters to us is the quality and on-time completion of tasks, not what's happening in the background.

About us:

- 600+ employees

- Clients: Large Western European companies with high standard quality for software production

Join our remote development team for interesting challenges!

Interviews are conducted in one step!
